title: BasketBall
description: Basketball is a great game to play with family, friends and even foe (although we do not condone this, arguements can be settled over a game of B-Ball.)

title: Swimming
description: With some professional teachers giving lessons in groups of 12, this activity can help strengthen your cardiovascular, muscular, respiratory and swimming skills!

title: Chess
description: Chess is a timeless, amazing game that has been involved with kings, philosophers, casuals and professionals alike. Bend your brain-power with this all-time favourite board game!

title: Volley Ball
description: Fun activites at the beach with friends.

title: Trampolining
description: Get your bounce on with some fun activites at our gymnasium!
